Main.titleFirst: Making it super easy to become
Main.tagMainText: We enable CPOs or those wishing to become one such as restaurant chains, retail stores, business centers, municipalities etc. to activate and manage chargers as easy & fast as handling home appliances
Main.blockFirst: Integration of Joul & activation of charging stations by the CPO, using our software
Main.blockSecond: On the mobile app EV driver locates the CPO whose station he/she wants to use
Main.blockThird: Charging is activated / deactivated and payments made on the app.
